sentences.en: A stupid fellow is talkative; a wise man is meditative.
sentences.cn: 蠢人饶舌, 智者思虑.

sentences.en: Celtic harp and Native American flute blend in meditative, imaginative , free flowing, soothing music.
sentences.cn: 译:沉思般的凯尔特竖琴和印地安长笛, 富于想象力, 给人安慰柔和的音乐疗效.

sentences.en: He also likes yoga's meditative side.
sentences.cn: 他也很喜欢瑜珈冥想的部份.

sentences.en: Here , no longer meditative. I took over myself.
sentences.cn: 此刻, 我不再苦思冥想,便考虑起自己的事来.

sentences.en: His eyes were more meditative, and his expression was more sad.
sentences.cn: 他的两眼更加郁郁沉思, 表情更为凄楚.

sentences.en: His meditative poems are his supreme achievement, many of which have become classics.
sentences.cn: 他的冥想诗成就相当高, 很多已经成为传世之佳作.

sentences.en: It is relaxing and restful with a soft, meditative serenity.
sentences.cn: 它是用一种舒缓、想平静使人放松和宁静的音乐.

sentences.en: Music can induce a meditative state in the listener.
sentences.cn: 音乐能够引导倾听者沉思。

sentences.en: Only Master Tholme was able to calm the boy , using Jedi meditative techniques.
sentences.cn: 只有索尔姆大师才能运用绝地冥思术让他安静下来.

sentences.en: Rhett, watching Wade's face with meditative eyes, saw the boy flinch.
sentences.cn: 瑞德若有所思地注视着韦德那张小脸, 发现这孩子在难过.

sentences.en: She found him in a meditative mood.
She stood looking at him with meditative eyes.
sentences.cn: 她站着用沉思的目光打量他.

sentences.en: She was in a meditative mood.
Tantric Sex is meditative, spontaneous and intimate lovemaking.
sentences.cn: 坦陀罗性是静心的, 自发和亲密的调情.

sentences.en: Used as a meditative aid, it helps to calm the mind.
sentences.cn: 作为一种沉思的援助, 这将有助于冷静头脑.

sentences.en: We were thought to meditative when a child . Is thinking a good thing?
sentences.cn: 我们从小被教育要善于思考,然而善于思考总是一件好事 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 冥想的，沉思的；耽于默想的

trans.tran_en: thinking deeply and seriously about something
